title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives, the maximized state of the views is lost.
EB: The maximized state of the views should be preserved when switching perspectives.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the application and maximize one or more views.
2. Switch to a different perspective.
3. Observe that the maximized state of the views is lost.
